price: Nagsabi sila: “Ikaw ba ay gumawa nito sa mga diyos namin, O Abraham?”
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ ءَأَنتَ فَعَلۡتَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَا يَٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū a-anta faʿalta hādhā biālihatinā yāib'rāhīmu
